Minimum Entropy Population Phasing [Halperin&Karp 04]: Given a set of genotypes, find a phasing with minimum entropy
Iterative improvement While there exists a genotype whose rephasing decreases the entropy of f, find the genotype that yields the highest decrease in entropy and re-phase it
